TADA_UpdateTribalLayers()
Function to update tribal layer shapefiles. Shapefiles are stored in inst/extdata. Existing shapefiles with the same name will be deleted first if they exist.
TADA_ViewATTAINS()
TADA_ViewATTAINS
TADA_addPoints()
Add points from an ArcGIS feature layer to a leaflet map
TADA_addPolys()
Add polygons from an ArcGIS feature layer to a leaflet map
fetchATTAINS()
fetchATTAINS
getBboxJson()
Get bounding box JSON
getFeatureLayer()
Retrieve feature layer from ArcGIS REST service getFeatureLayer is used by writeLayer to write feature layers to local files
getLayer()
Get a shapefile from a local folder, optionally crop it by a bounding box, and return it as a sf object getLayer is used within TADA_addPolys and TADA_addPoints
getPopup()
Get text for tribal marker popup getPopup is used within TADA_addPolys and TADA_addPoints
pchIcons()
Create icon(s) to be used to represent points on a map feature layer pchIcons is used within TADA_addPoints
quiet()
Silence print messages
writeLayer()
Download a shapefile from an API and save it to a local folder, overwriting existing file if it exists writeLayer is used by TADA_UpdateTribalLayers in TADAGeospatialRefLayers.R.
